VITTY



How to use?

  1. Upload a screenshot of your timetable
    • Ensure that the screenshot is taken directly from VTOP and IS THE DEFAULT VTOP FONT. It should fit in one single image (Zoom in/out to achieve this).
    • DO NOT upload a screenshot that has been compressed/ sent through any means such as Whatsapp, Instagram.
  2. Wait for about a minute for the ML Model to fetch your Slots.
  3. Individual slot data can be edited by clicking on the edit button next to the corresponding slot. Copy the complete slot details ( for eg. A1-CSE2011-ETH-SJT405-UGF )
  4. If unsatisfied with various slot values, click on the three dots and select Upload as Text. Copy your complete timetable from VTOP in text format.
  5. Click on the Upload Button.
  6. Download the app from https://dscv.it/vitty-app.
  7. For next semester, click on three dots and select Change Timetable to upload a new timetable
